formatDescription:
Lotus 1-2-3 Workbook is a spreadsheet program produced by the Lotus Software Group (later acquired by IBM). The original release was in 1983 and it has been discontinued since 2013.

The original 1-2-3 files have .wks extensions. Version 2.0 originally used a .wk1 extension but this was changed quickly to .wk2 and after this the number in the extension corrolates with the version number. Some later versions have the extension .123
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: Lotus 1-2-3 Worksheet Version 97
internalSignatures.note: Section Record Type = 0, record length dec 26 = 1A; file format version number = hex 03100400
